name: OtherDeformingDorsopathies
title: Other Deforming Dorsopathies
description: This value set is used to calculate OP-8 (MRI Lumbar Spine for Low Back Pain), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program. In calculation of OP-8, diagnoses of deforming dorsopathies (or other low back pain diagnosis) must appear on the MRI study claim to be eligible for inclusion in the measure's initial patient population.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes for deforming dorsopathies.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a diagnosis of deforming dorsopathy.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes for biomechanical lesions are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes not associated with diagnoses of deforming dorsopathies are excluded from this value set. Terminologies other than ICD-10 are also excluded from this value set.)
